pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/u1i/bambleweeny/master/img/bwy2.png)# b9y - Python Bindings for BambleweenyA client implementation for [Bambleweeny](https://github.com/u1i/bambleweeny)## Installpip install b9y## Usefrom b9y import B9yb9y = B9y() # for default connectionb9y = B9y('http://myhost:8080')b9y = B9y('http://myhost:8080', 'user', 'password')#### Get infoprint b9y.info()#### Set and get keyb9y.set('foo', 'bar') print b9y.get('foo')#### Try the counterprint b9y.incr('counter')#### Push and popb9y.push('super', 'trouper')print b9y.pop('super')## PyPi[b9y-cli on pypi](https://pypi.org/project/b9y/)
